nodes.text: Roon was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, in a region called the Cloak of the Sith. It was located on the Triellus Trade Route hyperspace route and the smugglers' route Mumble's Turnaround. The Roon Tours travel agency shared its name with the world.

Roon first appeared in "Tail of the Roon Comets," an episode of the Star Wars Legends television show Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO released on November 9, 1985. The planet was confirmed to be canon when it was mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016 for their roleplaying game system.
